Class Person

java.lang.Object
Person
public class Person
extends java.lang.Object
Class holding one person, it's health status, timetable, position and unique personal number.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Person class constructor.

  • Constructor Details

    • Person

      public Person​(int personalNumber, PersonHealth health, Position home, Timetable timetable)
      Person class constructor.

      Sets up all the properties except current location. Need to call visitLocation afterwards to set up location.

      Parameters:
      personalNumber - personal number of the person.
      health - health status of the person.
      home - position of the home of the person.
      timetable - timetable of the person.

  • Method Details

    • getPersonalNumber

      public int getPersonalNumber()
      Personal number getter
      Returns:
      personal number of this Person

    • visitLocation

      public boolean visitLocation​(Location location, ContagionParameters parameters)
      Handles Persons transfer to another location.
      Parameters:
      location - location to visit.
      parameters - Contagion parameters of the infection.
      Returns:
      true if Person relocated to the location, false otherwise.

    • getOccupation

      public Position getOccupation​(int hour)
      Returns current occupation from the persons timetable. Null if there is no occupation.
      Parameters:
      hour - hour of day.
      Returns:
      Position - position the person should be at at the given time.

    • setOccupation

      public void setOccupation​(int hour, Position position)
      Sets the persons occupation in it's timetable to given position at given time of day.
      Parameters:
      hour - hour of day.
      position - position for the person to move on at that time.

    • getHome

      public Position getHome()
      Home getter.
      Returns:
      Position of this persons home.

    • leaveCurrentLocation

      public void leaveCurrentLocation()
      Makes the person to be remove from currently visited location and sets it visited location to null.

    • move

      public Position move​(int hour, ContagionParameters parameters)
      Finds assigned position in timetable or generates random move near current position.
      Parameters:
      hour - current time of day.
      parameters - currently active contagion parameters containing restrictions.
      Returns:
      Position - position to move to.

    • getHealth

      public PersonHealth getHealth()
      Person health getter.
      Returns:
      PersonHealth - current health of this person.

    • tryInfect

      public void tryInfect​(double chance)
      Infects healthy person with the given chance
      Parameters:
      chance - chance that the healthy person gets infected

    • tryChangeHealth

      public void tryChangeHealth​(ContagionParameters parameters)
      If person is infected or quarantined this changes it's health according to contagion parameters.
      Parameters:
      parameters - contagion parameters to use while calculating health changes.

    • parsePerson

      public static Person parsePerson​(java.lang.String personString)
      Parses person from the given formatted string and returns it.
      Parameters:
      personString - formatted text representation of person class.
      Returns:
      Person - new person parsed from the string.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString​(Position position)
      Get inline text representation of the Person.
      Parameters:
      position - desired position of the person to end at
      Returns:
      Text representation of person to send via network.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Get inline text representation of the Person with the current position as position.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      Text representation of person to send via network.
